Class com.metratech.sdk.base.MTMeterSession

 
java.lang.Object
   |
   +----com.metratech.sdk.base.MTMeterSession

public abstract class MTMeterSession
extends Object

MTMeterSession is the abstract base class which provides a protocol independent represenation of a metered session. It provides default implementations for the protocol independent accessor and mutator methods. The MTMeterSession object holds the property values for a metered session. Objects of this type are created by MTMeter.CreateSession. MTMeterSession.InitProperty should be called for each property value before MTMeterSession.Save or MTMeterSession.Close is called to send the properties to the server. MTMeterSession.GetProperty can be used to retrieve property values from the session.

MTMeterSession

 
 public MTMeterSession()

createChildSession

 
 public abstract MTMeterSession createChildSession(String name) throws MTException

Creates a child session of the current session. Any number of children can be created for a parent session. Once MTMeterSession.Close has been called on a session, no more children can be created. Sessions that have been saved can still have more children added to them. When the child is deleted, it is removed from the parent. When a parent session is deleted, it deletes any children still connected to it.

 

Parameters:

name - The service name

Returns:

meterSession Returns the newly created session

Throws: MTException

if unsuccessful

close

 
 public abstract void close() throws MTException

After each property has been initialized to the correct value, Close sends the session and its parents and children, when appropriate, to the metering server.

 

Returns:

none

Throws: MTException

if unsuccessful.

getResultSession

 
 public abstract MTMeterSession getResultSession()

Returns the result session from a session that was closed with the sychronous flag set.

 

Returns:

ResultSession The result session.

getSynchronous

 
 public abstract boolean getSynchronous()

Obtains the session's synchronous flag.

 

Returns:

The session's synchronous flag.

setSynchronous

 
 public abstract void setSynchronous(boolean callSynchronous)

Marks this session as synchronous. When the session is closed, it will wait for a result session generated on the metering server as processed by the pipeline. Since this operation may take a long time to process, it should be used sparingly.

 

Parameters:

Synchronous - Is this session marked as synchronous.
